lead_paragraph: The New York Civil Liberties Union filed suit on behalf of six refugees in the Utica City district. Law enforcement agencies have pressed New York schools for months to ease enrollment for immigrants.

headline.print_headline: Advocates Sue School District, Claiming Weak Programs for Refugees
headline.main: Advocates Sue a New York School District, Claiming Weak Programs for Refugees

snippet: The New York Civil Liberties Union filed suit on behalf of six refugees in the Utica City district. Law enforcement agencies have pressed New York schools for months to ease enrollment for immigrants.
abstract: New York Civil Liberties Union files suit claiming Utica City School District hurt education of six refugee students by illegally pulling them from regular classes and putting them into weaker alternative programs.
